content: kaiya mei by jamie hoffman sizing notions newborn 6-12 months toddler small child 1 marker to mark bor child tween medium adult large adult yarn to fit head circumferences of 13 14 5 16 17 5 19 any worsted in 2 different colors 21 22 5 24 inches shown in malabrigo twist natural and vivid yarn studio star sprinkles gauge 20 sts and 24 row / 4 inches of stockinette yardage 70 80 100 120 140 150 170 190 total yards needles > 12 to 16 us 4/3 25 mm circulars for ribbing using magic loop > 12 to 16 us 6/4 0 mm circulars or size needed to obtain gauge and dpn s for crown if not using magic loop pattern using mc & size 4 circulars co 64 72 80 88 96 104 112 120 sts join for working in the round and pm work in k1p1 rib for 8 rounds switch to size 6 circulars knit 2 rnds in stockinette stitch begin colorwork for the next 22 rnds refer to the color chart below repeat each row in the chart to complete each round page | 1 knitosophy com kaiya mei kaiya mei color chart break mc yarn using cc work an additional 0 0 1 2 3 3 4 5 inches of stockinette or to desired length begin decreases switch to dpn s or magic loop when necessary round 23 k6 k2tog round 24 k5 k2tog round 25 k all round 26 k4 k2tog round 27 k all round 28 k3 k2tog round 29 k all round 30 k2 k2tog round 31 k all round 32 k1 k2tog round 33 k2tog break yarn weave in all loose ends to the wrong side and trim abbreviations cc contrast color pm place marker co cast on k2tog knit 2 stitches together mc main color page | 2 knitosophy com kaiya mei
